Articles.Content:
A 42-year-old Zamboni driver in Toronto was tapped to be the emergency backup goalie for the Carolina Hurricanes after both goalies were injured. The 'Canes went on to win 6-3. 

https://globalnews.ca/news/6584977/canes-beat-leafs-with-zamboni-driver-in-goal/

https://globalnews.ca/news/6584957/david-ayres-hurricanes-leafs-reaction/

Anybody have any other tales of livin' the dream?
